DocDoom2,"2014-07-16T03:34:10.023Z","A Very Customizable Constraction Figure","

I had been wanting at least one of the Legends of Chima
column2: Constraction Figures and when I got this, I was delighted by both having it and all the ways you could customize it if you have other parts.

column1: The Package was very standard, as it was a bag, introduced to this system of building for the Breakout wave of Hero Factory.
The amount and selection of parts is very good as it has at least five exclusive ones.

column2: t take to long, which is convenient since most of the time you want to play with it, but it is long enough to please those who enjoy building more than playing like collectors.

column1: The completed model is about the size of 6202 Rocka
column2: and can be incorporated into play very well as it can be used when you have your&nbsp
